seo.title: Vernazza Restaurants 2025 | Harbor Dining in Cinque Terre
seo.description: Discover the best restaurants in Vernazza. Harborside dining, fresh seafood, and stunning views at Cinque Terre's most scenic village.

body.title: Restaurants in Vernazza
body.subtitle: Experience exceptional dining with views of the iconic harbor. Fresh catch daily and traditional Ligurian cuisine in the most romantic setting.

features.title: Belforte
features.description: Carved into the rocks with spectacular harbor views.

features.title: Gambero Rosso
features.description: Harborside institution known for fresh seafood and pasta.

features.title: Ristorante Pizzeria Vulnetia
features.description: Traditional dishes with harbor terrace seating.

features.title: Trattoria Gianni Franzi
features.description: Family-run with homemade pasta and local wines.

features.title: Gelateria Il Porticciolo
features.description: Award-winning gelato on the main square.

features.title: Bar La Torre
features.description: Perfect for breakfast or sunset aperitivo with views.
